Lyric:
[by:蠢梨Sherry]
[00:00.31]Nah nah nah nah nah
[00:01.35]
[00:10.55]I heard he spent five hundred pounds on jeans
[00:13.54]Goes to the gym at least six times a week
[00:15.97]Wears both shoes with no socks on his feet
[00:18.67]And I hear he's on a new diet at watches what he eats
[00:21.06]He's got his eyebrows plucked and his asshole bleached
[00:23.76]Owns every single Ministry CD
[00:26.18]Tribal tattoos and he don't know what it means
[00:28.70]But I heard he makes you happy, so that's fine by me
[00:31.11]But still, I'm just keepin' it real
[00:33.74]Still lookin' at your Instagram and I'll be creepin' a lil'
[00:36.33]I'll be tryin' not to double tap, from way back
[00:38.18]'Cause I know that's where the trouble's at
[00:40.76]Let me remind you of the days when
[00:42.91]You used to hold my hand
[00:43.94]And when we sipped champagne out of cider cans
[00:46.34]I guess if you were Louis Lane, I wasn't Superman
[00:48.98]Just a young boy tryin' to be loved
[00:51.16]So let me give it to ya
[00:52.41]I don't wanna know about your new man
[00:54.76]'Cause if it was meant to be
[00:56.86]You wouldn't be callin' me up tryin' to
[00:59.35]'Cause I'm positive that he don't wanna know about me
[01:01.92]I don't wanna know about your new man
[01:04.94]We'll get there eventually
[01:06.97]I know you're missin' all this kind of love
[01:09.59]But I'm positive that he don't wanna know about me
[01:12.08]Your new man rents a house in the 'burb
[01:14.97]And wears a man bag on his shoulder, but I call it a purse
[01:17.19]Every year, he goes to Málaga with all the fellas
[01:19.62]Drinks beer, but has a six pack, I'm kinda jealous
[01:22.25]He wears sunglasses indoors, in winter, at nighttime
[01:25.29]And every time a rap song comes on, he makes a gang sign
[01:27.87]Says "Chune, bwoydem light up the room!"
[01:30.24]But enough about him, girl, let's talk about you
[01:32.51]You were the type of girl who sat beside the water readin'
[01:35.09]Eatin' a packet of crisp, but you will never find you cheatin'
[01:37.67]Now you're eatin' kale, hittin' the gym
[01:39.62]Keepin' up with Kylie and Kim
[01:40.87]In the back of the club, kissin' a boy that ain't him
[01:43.34]Okay, you need to be alone
[01:45.12]And if you wanna talk about it, you can call my phone
[01:47.74]I just thought I would tell you, 'cause oughta know
[01:50.22]You're still a young girl tryin' to be loved
[01:52.45]So let me give it to ya
[01:53.65]I don't wanna know about your new man
[01:56.06]'Cause if it was meant to me
[01:58.04]You wouldn't be callin' me up tryin' to
[02:00.67]'Cause I'm positive that he don't wanna know about me
[02:03.23]I don't wanna know about your new man
[02:06.21]We'll get there eventually
[02:08.60]I know you're missin' all this kind of love
[02:10.84]But I'm positive that he don't wanna know about me
[02:13.42]Baby, I'm not tryin' to ruin your week
[02:16.79]But you act so differently
[02:19.72]When you're with him, I know you're lonely
[02:23.66]Pleasy remember you're still free
[02:27.06]To make the choice and leave
[02:29.70]Don't call me up, you need to show me
[02:33.83]I don't wanna know about your new man
[02:36.88]'Cause if it was meant to be
[02:39.46]You wouldn't be callin' me up tryin' to
[02:41.60]'Cause I'm positive that he don't wanna know about me
[02:44.12]I don't wanna know about your new man
[02:47.05]We'll get there eventually
[02:49.13]I know you're missin' all this kind of love
[02:51.67]But I'm positive that he don't wanna know about me
[02:54.29]But I'm positive that he don't wanna know about
[02:57.36]But I'm positive that he don't wanna know about
[02:59.75]I don't wanna know about your new man
[03:05.90]
